text: ai kitaabavaalo! hamaara rasool aise samay tumhaare paas aaya hai aur tumhaare lie (hamaara aadesh) khol-kholakar bayaan karata hai, jabaki rasoolon ke aane ka silasila ek muddat se band tha, taaki tum yah na kah sako ki "hamaare paas koee shubh-samaachaar denevaala aur sachet karanevaala nahin aaya." to dekho! ab tumhaare paas shubh-samaachaar denevaala aur sachet karanevaala aa gaya hai. allaah ko har cheez kee saamarthy praapt hai
